overview: Abandoned at a young age at an orphanage, Aurora lived most of her life in Europe with her adopted parents. After a life changing event where she overheard her parents talking about her true parentage, Aurora decided to return to Malaysia in search of her biological parents. In her search, she also finds herself learning about Islam, and embarks on a spiritual journey to discover a part of her heritage.
title: Ada Apa Dengan Dosa
